text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Network Connectivity>
We are investigating connectivity issues for some instances in the SA-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Network Connectivity>
Between 7:26 AM and 7:34 AM PDT, and between 7:57 AM to 8:05 AM PDT, some instances experienced connectivity issues in the SA-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
